mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents(midx, contentsCategory, contentsSubject, contentsArticle, contentsLatitude, contentsLongitude, contentsHashtag, aidx) VALUES(#{midx}, #{contentsCategory}, #{contentsSubject}, #{contentsArticle}, #{contentsLatitude}, #{contentsLongitude}, #{contentsHashtag}, #{aidx})
mapper.select:
SELECT c.cidx, c.contentsSubject, c.contentsViewCount, c.contentsReviewCount,c.aidx, count(cl.clidx) as likecount FROM contents c left join contentslike cl on c.cidx=cl.cidx WHERE contentsCategory = #{category} AND contentsYN = 'N'
group by c.cidx, c.contentsSubject, c.contentsViewCount, c.contentsReviewCount, c.aidx order by cidx desc limit #{page}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) as cnt from contents where contentsYN="N" and contentsCategory=#{category}

SELECT cidx, contentsCategory, contentsSubject, convert(contentsArticle using utf8) as contentsArticle, contentsViewCount, contentsReviewCount, contentsWriteday, contentsLatitude, contentsLongitude, contentsHashtag , aidx FROM contents WHERE cidx = #{cidx}
SELECT storedFileName, filePath From attachFile WHERE cidx=#{cidx}
mapper.update: update contents set contentsYN = 'Y' , contentsWriteday = now() where cidx=#{cidx}
update contents set contentsViewCount = contentsViewCount+1 where cidx=#{cidx}
mapper.select: select round(avg(reviewScore),1) as avg from review where reviewYN='N' and cidx=#{cidx}
select count(ridx) from review where reviewYN='N' and cidx=#{cidx}
